title: #145: The Importance of Bids and Repairs in Your Relationship
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Pulling from the work of Dr. John Gottman, we talk about the importance of bids and repairs to the health of a relationships.       RESOURCES MENTIONED  Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815 Enroll in our...
itunes:summary:
Pulling from the work of Dr. John Gottman, we talk about the importance of bids and repairs to the health of a relationships.

Click here to learn more about Dr. John & Dr. Julie Gottman's work  

 

Register for the Let Them Love You Workshop live in Houston, TX

 

RESOURCES MENTIONED

  • Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to 832-219-7815
  • Enroll in our Coaching Signature Program for single and partnered women: From Addicted & Avoidant to Available
  • Come to our next Healed and Loved Woman Retreat
